text: the point I'm making without raking over
the last 24 hours is that I think by any
measure the actions that have been taken
the full and equivocal public and
parliamentary apology by now's where she
made clear that anti-semitism is racism
full stop
there's no hierarchy of racism
anti-semitism should be weeded out
wherever it exists and that she has been
suspended from the Labor Party and had
the whip
withdrawn in a relatively short period
of time we have got to do more to ensure
that people understand that
anti-semitism has no place either in the
labour party or in British as I think
the party has and it's doing well that's
why we have an investigation underway
that's why we have a report that's due
to be published which will clarify
policies and guidelines and will ensure
that swift action is taken
